item.description: Due to Aneka Rasa's unexpected closure, we'll be just a half block up the street at SoulFire, where the staff will be ready for 18 or more people at 7 PM. Since I don't believe we'll all be able to sit together, the talk about "the history of what atheists call themselves" will be postponed. Thanks to those who responded with feedback about the location change.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the Boston Atheists if you're early, otherwise you'll see the group
item.name: Blasphemy BBQ at SoulFire Allston
